caseTitle: The State v. Muhammad Kaleem Bhatti
authorJudge: MR. JUSTICE ASIF SAEED KHAN KHOSA
tagline:
A sentence of imprisonment in default of payment of fine is not a substitute for payment of fine but as a matter of fact the said sentence of imprisonment is a punishment for non-payment of fine.
It has categorically been provided in section 33-E of the National Accountability Ordinance, 1999 that a fine imposed upon a convict is to be recovered by way of arrears of land revenue and the said provision is not controlled by or subject to the provisions of section 70, PPC.
